title: Wolf Facts for Kids: Learn Fun and Interesting Facts About Wolves
description: "Wolf Facts for Kids" is a picture/learning book to help kids read. Filled with beautiful full color photos and great information, "Wolf Facts for Kids" ensures that kids will enjoy this excellent book over and over again."Wolf Facts for Kids" cover topics such as:-Facts About Wolves-Appearance-Diet-Family-And More!
author: Andrea Robeson
